name: Haunted One
description: You are haunted by something so terrible that you dare not speak of it. You've tried to bury it and run away from it, to no avail. Whatever this thing is that haunts you can't be slain with a sword or banished with a spell.

feature.name: Heart of Darkness
feature.description: Those who look into your eyes can see that you have faced unimaginable horror and that you are no stranger to darkness. Though they might fear you, commoners will extend you every courtesy and do their utmost to help you. Unless you have shown yourself to be a danger to them, they will even take up arms to fight alongside you, should you find yourself facing an enemy alone.

fixed.description: A chest, a crowbar, a hammer, three wooden stakes, a holy symbol, a flask of holy water, a set of manacles, a steel mirror, a flask of oil, a tinderbox, and 3 torches
One gothic trinket of special significance

suggestions: I don't run from evil. Evil runs from me.
I like to read and memorize poetry. It keeps me calm and brings me fleeting moments of happiness.
I spend money freely and live life to the fullest, knowing that tomorrow I might die.
I live for the thrill of the hunt.
I don't talk about the thing that torments me. I'd rather not burden others with my curse.
I expect danger around every corner.
I refuse to become a victim, and I will not allow others to be victimized.
I put no trust in divine beings.

suggestions.ideal: Sacrifice. I try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost.
Desperation. I'll stop the spirits that haunt me even if I have to become evil myself.
Cleansing. I kill monsters to make the world a safer place, and to exorcise my own demons.
Vigilante. I have a dark calling that puts me above the law.
Preparation. I like to know my enemy's capabilities and weaknesses before rushing into battle.
Destruction. I'm a monster that destroys other monsters, and anything else that gets in my way.

suggestions: I keep my thoughts and discoveries in a journal. My journal is my legacy.
I would sacrifice my life and my soul to protect the innocent.
My torment drove away the person I love. I strive to win back the love I've lost.
A terrible guilt consumes me. I hope that I can find redemption through my actions.
There's evil in me, I can feel it. It must never be set free.
I have a child to protect. I must make the world a safer place for him (or her).
I have certain rituals that I must follow every day. I can never break them.
I assume the worst in people.
I feel no compassion for the dead. They're the lucky ones.
I have an addiction to a substance that dulls the pain.
I am a purveyor of doom and gloom who lives in a world without hope.
I talk to spirits that no one else can see.

suggested_characteristics: You have learned to live with the terror that haunts you. You are a survivor, who can be very protective of those who bring light into your darkened life.
